query:
ALTER TABLE notifications MODIFY COLUMN type ENUM(
  'task_assigned',
  'task_status_changed',
  'task_deadline_approaching',
  'task_overdue',
  'task_progress_updated',
  'task_comment_mention',
  'inspection_requested',
  'inspection_completed',
  'inspection_passed',
  'inspection_failed',
  'checklist_assigned',
  'reinspection_required',
  'defect_assigned',
  'defect_created',
  'defect_status_changed',
  'defect_resolved',
  'defect_reinspected',
  'defect_deadline_approaching',
  'project_member_added',
  'project_milestone_reached',
  'project_status_changed',
  'file_uploaded',
  'comment_added',
  'dependency_blocked',
  'comment_mention',
  'task_updated',
  'deadline_reminder',
  'system_health_warning',
  'system_health_critical',
  'system_health_info'
) NOT NULL;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 33MDJNP9oQHNu88.9be2e504806b --database XGUfRkFw3wTJbZrCqsFJBu --execute ALTER TABLE notifications MODIFY COLUMN type ENUM(
  'task_assigned',
  'task_status_changed',
  'task_deadline_approaching',
  'task_overdue',
  'task_progress_updated',
  'task_comment_mention',
  'inspection_requested',
  'inspection_completed',
  'inspection_passed',
  'inspection_failed',
  'checklist_assigned',
  'reinspection_required',
  'defect_assigned',
  'defect_created',
  'defect_status_changed',
  'defect_resolved',
  'defect_reinspected',
  'defect_deadline_approaching',
  'project_member_added',
  'project_milestone_reached',
  'project_status_changed',
  'file_uploaded',
  'comment_added',
  'dependency_blocked',
  'comment_mention',
  'task_updated',
  'deadline_reminder',
  'system_health_warning',
  'system_health_critical',
  'system_health_info'
) NOT NULL;
